# Cliffside Resort

## Hotel Overview
Cliffside Resort is located in Acapulco, Guerrero, Mexico. Upscale retreat with world-class amenities

**Guest Rating:** 4.6/5.0
**Total Rooms:** 320

## Contact Information
**Address:** Avenida 241, Acapulco, Guerrero 77241
**Phone:** +52-744-555-0261
**Email:** acapulco1@anycompany.com

## Check-in & Check-out

### Check-in Time
Standard check-in time is 3:00 PM. Early check-in is subject to availability and may be requested at the time of booking or by contacting the hotel directly.

### Check-out Time
Standard check-out time is 11:00 AM. Late check-out until 2:00 PM may be available for an additional fee of $50, subject to availability.

### Express Check-out
Express check-out is available. Guests can review and approve their bill the night before departure and simply drop off their room keys at the front desk or in the express check-out box.

## Reservations & Cancellations

### Making a Reservation
Reservations can be made through:
- Our website: www.anycompany.com
- Phone: +52-744-555-0261
- Email: acapulco1@anycompany.com
- Mobile app: AnyCompany Hotels

### Cancellation Policy
Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours prior to arrival to avoid a one-night room charge. Cancellations for group bookings (10+ rooms) require 72 hours notice.

### Modification Policy
Reservations can be modified up to 24 hours before arrival at no charge. Changes to dates are subject to availability and rate differences may apply.

### Deposit Requirements
A valid credit card is required at the time of booking. A deposit equal to one night's room rate plus tax will be charged at booking for reservations made within 7 days of arrival.

### Payment Methods
We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and Diners Club. Cash and debit cards are also accepted.

## Room Information

### Room Types Available
- **Standard Room:** Comfortable accommodations with essential amenities ($200-350 per night)
- **Deluxe Room:** Enhanced space and upgraded amenities ($350-500 per night)
- **Suite:** Spacious suite with separate living area ($550-900 per night)

### Bed Configurations
- King bed
- Two Queen beds
- Accessible rooms with King bed

### Maximum Occupancy
- Standard/Deluxe Rooms: Up to 4 guests
- Suites: Up to 6 guests

### In-Room Amenities
All rooms include:
- Complimentary high-speed WiFi
- Flat-screen TV with premium channels
- Coffee maker with complimentary coffee and tea
- Mini-refrigerator
- In-room safe
- Iron and ironing board
- Hair dryer
- Complimentary toiletries
- Climate control

### Accessibility Features
Accessible rooms are available featuring:
- Roll-in showers or accessible tubs
- Grab bars
- Lowered fixtures
- Visual alert systems
- Accessible door hardware

## Hotel Amenities

- Full-Service Spa
- Outdoor Swimming Pool
- 24-Hour Fitness Center
- Complimentary High-Speed Wifi
- On-Site Restaurant
- Valet Parking

### Pool
Our outdoor pool is open daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM. Pool towels are provided.

### Fitness Center
Our 24-hour fitness center is equipped with cardio machines, free weights, and strength training equipment.

### Restaurant & Bar
Our on-site restaurant serves breakfast (6:30 AM - 10:30 AM), lunch (11:30 AM - 2:30 PM), and dinner (5:30 PM - 10:00 PM). The bar is open from 4:00 PM to midnight.

### Business Center
Business center facilities are not available at this property.

### Parking
Parking is available for $45 per night (valet). Valet parking service is available.

### Pet Policy
Pets are welcome! We charge a non-refundable pet fee of $50 per stay. Maximum of 2 pets per room, with a weight limit of 50 lbs per pet. Service animals are always welcome at no charge.

## Pricing & Fees

### Room Rates
Room rates vary by season and availability:
- Standard Room: $200-350 per night
- Deluxe Room: $350-500 per night
- Suite: $550-900 per night

Rates are subject to change and do not include taxes and fees.

### Resort Fees
A resort fee of $35 per night per night applies and includes WiFi, fitness center access, and pool access.

### Parking Fees
$45 per night (valet)

### Pet Fees
$50 per stay (non-refundable)

### Extra Guest Charges
Additional guests beyond standard occupancy: $25 per person per night (children under 12 stay free)

## Location & Transportation

### Address & Directions
Avenida 241, Acapulco, Guerrero 77241

### Airport Transportation
Airport shuttle service is not provided. Taxi and rideshare services are readily available.

### Public Transportation
The hotel is conveniently located near public transportation options. Please contact the front desk for detailed directions and schedules.

### Nearby Attractions
Upscale retreat with world-class amenities Our concierge can provide recommendations and assistance with booking local tours and attractions.

## Services

### Room Service
Room service is not available. However, many delivery options are available in the area.

### Housekeeping
Daily housekeeping service is provided. Additional cleaning services can be requested at the front desk.

### Laundry Services
Laundry services can be arranged through the front desk with local providers.

### Concierge Services
Front desk staff are happy to provide local recommendations and assistance.

### Wake-up Calls
Automated wake-up calls can be arranged through your in-room phone or by contacting the front desk.

## Policies

### Smoking Policy
Cliffside Resort is a non-smoking property. Smoking is permitted in designated outdoor areas only. A cleaning fee of $250 applies to any smoking in guest rooms.

### Age Requirements
Guests must be at least 18 years of age to check in.

### ID Requirements
A valid government-issued photo ID and credit card are required at check-in.

### Damage Policy
Guests are responsible for any damage to hotel property. Charges for damages will be applied to the credit card on file.

### Quiet Hours
Quiet hours are observed from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. We ask all guests to be respectful of others during these hours.

## WiFi & Technology

### WiFi Availability
Complimentary high-speed WiFi is available throughout the hotel, including all guest rooms and public areas.

### Network Access
Network name and password are provided at check-in and are also available in your guest room.

### Smart TV
All rooms feature smart TVs with access to premium channels and streaming capabilities.

### Charging Ports
Rooms are equipped with USB charging ports and standard electrical outlets.

## Special Requests

### Cribs & Rollaway Beds
Cribs are available at no charge (subject to availability). Rollaway beds are available for $25 per night.

### Connecting Rooms
Connecting rooms are available and can be requested at the time of booking (subject to availability).

### Floor Preferences
High floor and low floor preferences can be requested but cannot be guaranteed. We will do our best to accommodate your preference.

### Hypoallergenic Rooms
Hypoallergenic rooms with special cleaning protocols are available upon request. Please notify us at the time of booking.

## Additional Information

For any questions or special requests, please contact us at:
- Phone: +52-744-555-0261
- Email: acapulco1@anycompany.com

We look forward to welcoming you to Cliffside Resort!

## Check-in & Check-out

## Reservations & Cancellations

### Making a Reservation
Reservations can be made through:
- Our website: www.anycompany.com
- Phone: +54-11-555-0001

Reservations can be modified up to 24 hours before arrival at no charge. Changes to dates are subject to availability and rate differences may apply.

A valid credit card is required at the time of booking. A deposit equal to one night's room rate plus tax will be charged at booking for reservations made within 7 days of arrival.

We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and Diners Club. Cash and debit cards are also accepted.
